page.title: 13 THE VILLAGE POLICEWOMAN
page.content: The village policewoman has been in the village of Shorne for three and a half years. Her job is very different to that of a town policewoman. She rides around the area on a motorbike but can also be seen walking around the village. She is well known by all the people of the village and often her job is more like a community worker. Very rarely do any major crimes happen in the area but she is often involved in the policing of Gravesend. She often gets called out in the middle of the night to deal with road accidents or suspected prowlers. She prefers working in a village to a town as she can get involved in the community and get to know the people whose life and property she protects.
